MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: CVS, Git, Commits, SCM, VCS, Bonsai
English.Char_Desc_80: Postsai allows easy queries on commits to Git and CVS.
English.Char_Desc_250: Postsai allows easy queries on commits to Git and CVS. It supports self-hosted repostories as well as GitHub, SourceForge and Gitlab. Postsai is a successor of Bonsai with a modern web interface and support for modern repositories.
English.Char_Desc_450: Postsai allows easy queries on commits to Git and CVS. It supports self-hosted repostories as well as GitHub, SourceForge and Gitlab. Postsai is a successor of Bonsai with a modern web interface and support for modern repositories.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Postsai allows easy queries on commits to Git and CVS. It supports self-hosted repostories as well as GitHub, SourceForge and Gitlab. Postsai is a successor of Bonsai with a modern web interface and support for modern repositories.
